answer.at-least-one: Please select at least one answer.

comment-list.a11y-check_circle: Filters all questions marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-not_interested: Filters all questions marked as wrong
comment-list.comment-got-favorited: A question of yours got favorited!
comment-list.comment-sent-to-moderator: The question will be reviewed by a moderator.
comment-list.correct: Marked as correct by the professor
comment-list.wrong: Marked as wrong by the professor

comment-page.a11y-text_correct: This question was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text_grade: This question was marked as a bonus question.
comment-page.a11y-text_read: This question was discussed in full view on the beamer
comment-page.a11y-text_wrong: This question was marked as not correct.
comment-page.comment: Question {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{bonus}} {{beamer}}
comment-page.has-answer: The teacher commented on the question.
comment-page.live-announcer: You are now on the questions page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.mark-not-correct: Marked as correct by the professor
comment-page.mark-not-favorite: Bonus question: Your professor intends to give a bonus for that question.
comment-page.mark-not-wrong: Marked as wrong by the professor
comment-page.new-comment: A new question with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.search-box-input-description: Here you can search for questions.

home-page.exactly-8: A session key is a combination of exactly 8 digits.
home-page.no-room-found: No session found with this key
home-page.only-numbers: A session key is a combination of 8 digits.

room-page.a11y-announcer: You are now in the session with the key you entered.
room-page.a11y-question_answer: Opens the page where you can ask questions and vote up or down other questions.
room-page.live-announcer: You're in the session now. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.

question-wall.intro-desc: Click on a question or navigate forwards with the space bar or backwards and forwards with the arrow keys.
